properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas Vineyard and Nantucket; Coastal Waters from Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard extending out to 20 nm South of Block Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 4:01PM EST until February 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...In Massachusetts coastal waters, Coastal Waters
extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas Vineyard and
Nantucket. In Rhode Island coastal waters, Coastal Waters from
Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard extending out to 20 nm South of
Block Island.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
